description: Mobile techniques used by SpyNote RAT, ATT&CK software S0305 v1.2
name: SpyNote RAT (S0305)

techniques.comment: SpyNote RAT uses an Android broadcast receiver to automatically start when the device boots.[1]
SpyNote RAT can activate the victim's microphone.[1]
SpyNote RAT can read SMS messages.[1]
SpyNote RAT can copy files from the device to the C2 server.[1]
SpyNote RAT collects the device's location.[1]
